welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Glenn Heights, where southern hospitality meets small-town charm. We're known for our friendly community and beautiful parks. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. Welcome!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redbird Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Redbird Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Arlington Municipal Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Arlington Municipal Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Love Field Airport serves as the primary hub for all domestic flights.

terminals.name: Southwest Airlines Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal exclusively serves Southwest Airlines flights, with a variety of amenities and services available for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport, with no time limit.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The largest terminal at DFW, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Serving mainly American Airlines and its regional partners.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Serving major airlines such as Delta and United.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: The international terminal at DFW, serving a variety of international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: Serving mainly American Airlines and its regional partners.

terminals.name: Terminal F
terminals.description: The newest terminal at DFW, serving mainly international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Addison Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Meacham Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
